saving in qs2 format in stamps

Source: R/format_registry.R
st_qs.Rd

Attempts to write x to path using qs2::qs_save() or qs2::qsave() when available, otherwise falls back to qs::qsave(). Errors if neither package is installed.

Reads an object from path using qs2::qs_read() or qs2::qread() when available, otherwise falls back to qs::qread(). Errors if neither package is installed.

Usage

.st_write_qs2(x, path, ...)

.st_read_qs2(path, ...)

Arguments

x

R object to save.

path

Destination file path.

...

Additional arguments passed to the underlying writer.

Value

Invisibly returns what the underlying writer returns.

The R object read from path.

On this page
